UPSAPI v2

In response to the UPS OAuth 2.0 requirement this assists the API transaction for UPS services

Jeremy Heminger jeremy.heminger@aqumor.com, contact@jeremyheminger.com

                  ᓚᘏᗢ

Note : This library does not make API requests. It abstracts data into simpler methods and parses JSON to be sent and received via REST. It does validate data and data types despite the UPS API only supporting strings. Currently this only supports the UPS Shipping and Adress Validation API(s)

Dependancies

  • 💧 Newtonsoft.JSON
  • 💧 AQHelpers.dll

Versions
